DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study improve arm function adult hemiplegic cerebral palsy . Participants receive transcranial direct current stimulation ( sham ) combination upper extremity robotic therapy .
DOC.brief_title: tDCS Robotic Training Adults With Cerebral Palsy
DOC.detailed_description: Therapy consist 20 minute non-invasive , low-level brain stimulation ( transcranial direct current stimulation , tDCS ) , follow one hour shoulder/wrist robotic training . Participants enrol therapy 3 time per week 12 week ( 36 session ) . Before therapy , participant receive assessment arm function , well assessment brain activity , use electroencephalography ( EEG ) transcranial magnetic stimulation ( TMS ) .
